Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Absorber:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Absorber:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Absorber:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !Absorber:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

Absorber:ConsumeDagger.NAME: Consume Dagger
Absorber:ConsumeDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fatal: Add a card to your card reward pool Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: to your card reward pool Exhaust

Absorber:BloodyFeather.NAME: Bloody Feather
Absorber:BloodyFeather.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL (Increases by !M! per turn.)

Absorber:StimNeedle.NAME: Stim Needle
Absorber:StimNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !M! mana and draw !M! extra card.

Absorber:DrainDamage.NAME: Drain Damage
Absorber:DrainDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount of drain done this combat
Absorber:DrainDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times the amount of drain done this combat

Absorber:FaultySyringe.NAME: Faulty Syringe
Absorber:FaultySyringe.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Health. NL Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! regen Exhaust.

Absorber:DrainLash.NAME: Drain Lash
Absorber:DrainLash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you absorber:drain, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

Absorber:HealthDrain.NAME: Health Drain
Absorber:HealthDrain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP on your Turn, absorber:drain !Absorber:DrainVariable! from all enemies.

Absorber:ChosenAttack.NAME: Chosen Attack
Absorber:ChosenAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is not attacking, gain !M! artifact.

Absorber:GremlinRally.NAME: Gremlin Rally
Absorber:GremlinRally.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Gremlin Stab to your hand.
Absorber:GremlinRally.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Gremlin Stab to your hand.

Absorber:LagavulinDrain.NAME: Lagavulin Drain
Absorber:LagavulinDrain.DESCRIPTION: absorber:Drain !M! HP. NL absorber:Drain !M! strength from target Exhaust.

Absorber:LooterDagger.NAME: Looter Dagger
Absorber:LooterDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain gold equal to unblocked damage.

Absorber:PrepareOperation.NAME: Prepare Operation
Absorber:PrepareOperation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Nl Next turn, gain !M! Energy

Absorber:GiantHeadSlam.NAME: Giant Head Slam
Absorber:GiantHeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: After the 5th turn, this card deals !D! damage

Absorber:OrbSpray.NAME: Orb Spray
Absorber:OrbSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL (Increase by !M! damage per turn.)

Absorber:SphericShield.NAME: Spherical Shield
Absorber:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

Absorber:StabbingBook.NAME: Stabbing Book
Absorber:StabbingBook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increases number of attacks each turn.

Absorber:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Absorber:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain !M! card this turn

Absorber:VolatileSteroid.NAME: Volatile Steroid
Absorber:VolatileSteroid.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Take another turn after this one. NL End your Turn. Exhaust.

Absorber:LifeSupport.NAME: Life Support
Absorber:LifeSupport.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, absorber:drain !M! HP from all enemies
Absorber:LifeSupport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL At the end of the turn, absorber:drain !M! HP from all enemies

Absorber:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
Absorber:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Buff each attack in your hand by !M! damage.

Absorber:NeverEndingWall.NAME: Never Ending Wall
Absorber:NeverEndingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this amount for all Never Ending Walls by !M! this combat.

Absorber:Crystallize.NAME: Crystallize
Absorber:Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal double damage next turn. NL End your turn Exhaust.

Absorber:BeatDown.NAME: BeatDown
Absorber:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of the turn.

Absorber:GremlinArmy.NAME: Gremlin Army
Absorber:GremlinArmy.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add !M! Gremlin Stabs to your hand.

Absorber:SentrySlam.NAME: Sentry Slam
Absorber:SentrySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attack twice on odd turns.

Absorber:WideSwing.NAME: Wide Swing
Absorber:WideSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL absorber:Drain !Absorber:DrainVariable! HP from all enemies.

Absorber:SetupSkill.NAME: Steady Hands
Absorber:SetupSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! absorber:protected. NL Retain !Absorber:SecondMagic! card. NL Next turn, Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! energy.

Absorber:EnergySurge.NAME: Energy Surge
Absorber:EnergySurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! times X damage. NL Deal double when energy is above !Absorber:MaxEnergy!.

Absorber:ManicAttack.NAME: Manic Attack
Absorber:ManicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage 4 times. NL (Double damage below 50% HP.)

Absorber:OverExert.NAME: Over Exert
Absorber:OverExert.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage. NL Next turn, Draw !M! less card next turn. NL Costs decreases by Energy spend on attacks this turn.

Absorber:Adrenaline.NAME: Adrenaline
Absorber:Adrenaline.DESCRIPTION: Convert all HP loss to damage taken next turn. NL Draw !M! cards Exhaust.

Absorber:Overdose.NAME: Overdose
Absorber:Overdose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! Energy. Next turn, take !M! damage.

Absorber:ExperimentVaccine.NAME: Experimental Vaccine
Absorber:ExperimentVaccine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! Max-HP. NL Lose !M! HP NL Exhaust.

Absorber:Draw_Attack.NAME: Draw Attack
Absorber:Draw_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw !M! cards NL absorber:Stimulated:Draw !Absorber:SecondMagic! cards instead

Absorber:SurgicalPrecision.NAME: Surgical Precision
Absorber:SurgicalPrecision.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL absorber:Stimulated: Gain !M! energy and draw !M! card

Absorber:EnergyWall.NAME: Energy Wall
Absorber:EnergyWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL absorber:Stimulated: Gain !M! extra Block.

Absorber:GremlinSmashCard.NAME: Gremlin Smash
Absorber:GremlinSmashCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL absorber:Stimulated: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Absorber:ReptoDaggerB.NAME: Blue Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerB.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Draw !M! Cards Exhaust.

Absorber:ReptoDaggerG.NAME: Green Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerG.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Gain !B! Block Exhaust.

Absorber:ReptoDaggerP.NAME: Purple Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Add !M! *Miracle+ to your hand Exhaust.

Absorber:ReptoDaggerM.NAME: MultiDagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerM.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Miracle+ to your hand.

Absorber:ReptoDag.NAME: Reptomancer Daggers
Absorber:ReptoDag.DESCRIPTION: Choose A Dagger NL absorber:Stimulated Combine the Daggers.
